history.proof: intros a H. sauto lq: on depth: 3. qsimpl time: 1. qsimpl time: 1 use: Z,Zeven_plus_Zodd. qsimpl time: 1 use: Z,Zeven_plus_Zodd,Zeven_pred. qsimpl time: 1 use: Z,Zeven_plus_Zodd,Zeven_pred,Zodd_Sn.

ctx: apply Zodd_def1 in H as [k Hk].
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "- a" in the current goal.

ctx: apply Zodd_def1 in H as [k Hk].
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "- (?M2128 + ?M2129)" in the current goal.

ctx: apply Zodd_def1 in H as [k Hk].
exceptions.exn: In environment a : Z Hk : - a = 1 Unable to unify "match ?M2128 + ?M2129 with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => False | _ => True end" with "match a with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => False | _ => True end".

ctx: apply Zodd_def1 in H as [k Hk].
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall a b : Z, Zeven a -> Zodd b -> Zodd (a + b) a : Z Hk : - a = 1 Unable to unify "match Z.pred ?M2264 with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => True | _ => False end" with "match a with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => False | _ => True end".

ctx: apply Zodd_def1 in H as [k Hk].
exceptions.exn: In environment H1 : forall n : Z, Zodd n -> Zeven (Z.pred n) H0 : forall a b : Z, Zeven a -> Zodd b -> Zodd (a + b) a : Z Hk : - a = 1 Unable to unify "match Z.succ ?M2432 with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => False | _ => True end" with "match a with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => False | _ => True end".

ctx: apply Zodd_def1 in H as [k Hk].
exceptions.exn: The reference Zeven_0 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: apply Zodd_def1 in H as [k Hk].
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables a, b.

original: intros a H. apply Zodd_def1 in H as [k Hk]. rewrite Hk. rewrite Z.opp_add_distr. simpl. apply Zeven_plus_Zodd. apply Zeven_pred. apply Zodd_Sn. apply Zeven_0. auto. apply Zodd_0 in H. contradiction.
